Creating Team and Assigning Users

The Teams UI enables you to create and manage teams and assign users to the team.

 

Filters

The following is the list of filters available on this screen:

  • Is Active
  • Organization ID
  • Team ID
  • Team Name

Creating a Team

To create a team, perform the following steps:

 

  1. Navigate to Menu > Organization > Manage Teams 
  2. On the Teams page, click Create.
  3. On the Create New Team page, enter the team ID and name for the team. Select Is Active option as yes or no as required.
  4. Select the Organization ID from the drop-down and click Save and Continue.
  5. In the Add Users to the Team page, click Add to add a new user to the team. Select the Organization ID and User ID and click Submit.
  6. Click Save and Finish to save and complete the setup.

Editing a Team

You can edit the attributes of an existing teams using one of the below procedures:

 

Swipe-out List

  1. Navigate to Menu > Organization > Manage Teams 
  2. Swipe-out the menu on the required record card and select Edit.
  3. In the Edit window, modify the required fields.
  4. Click Save & Close to save the modified team details.

Edit View

  1. Select the team record card. The action buttons are displayed in the footer section.
  2. Click Edit to view the edit window. Modify the required fields.
  3. Click Save & Close to save the modified pullback team details.

 View

Swipe Out List

  • Swipe-out the menu on the required record card and select View.
  • In Team Wizard, you can view the details of the team.

 View

  • Select the required record card and you can view the action buttons displayed on the footer section.
  • Click View from the action button to view details of the team.

Deleting a Team

Swipe-out List

  1. Navigate to Menu > Organization > Manage Teams 
  2. Swipe-out menu on the required record card and select Delete.
  3. A confirmation pop-up prompts as 'Warning'.
  4. Click Yes to delete the team record.

Delete

  1. Select the required record card. The footer section with action buttons is displayed.
  2. Select Delete.
